author: Neil Shah
title: Didnâ€™t Like That New Album? Another One Is Coming Before You Know It
text:
In the age of music-streaming, some fans are drowning.
The music business is pumping out more singles, mixtapes, albums and videos than ever, industry experts say, the result of cheap digital-production tools, round-the-clock social-media marketing and the prodigious output of hip-hop stars.
It has never been easier to listen to vast quantities...
